articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks mixed as investors look ahead to HSBC earnings - CNBC
articles.description: HSBC is set to release its third-quarter earnings on Monday.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Shares in Asia-Pacific traded mixed on Monday as investors look ahead to the release of quarterly earnings by HSBC.

articles.title: Singapore to resume travel from South Asia, eases measures for those from Malaysia, Indonesia - The Star Online
